Package com.example.carturestibackend.controllers

Class CartController

java.lang.Object
com.example.carturestibackend.controllers.CartController
@Controller @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/cart") public class CartController extends Object
Controller class to handle HTTP requests related to carts.

  • Method Details

    • getCarts

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getCarts()
      Handler method for GET requests to "/cart". Retrieves all carts.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the view name and list of carts.

    • insertCart

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView insertCart(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid CartDTO cartDTO)
      Handler method for POST requests to "/cart". Inserts a new cart.
      Parameters:
      cartDTO - The CartDTO object to be inserted.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the view name and inserted cart ID.

    • getCart

      @GetMapping("/{id_cart}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getCart(@PathVariable("id_cart") String cartID)
      Handler method for GET requests to "/cart/{id_cart}". Retrieves a cart by ID.
      Parameters:
      cartID - The ID of the cart to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the view name and retrieved cart.

    • deleteCart

      @DeleteMapping("/{id_cart}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteCart(@PathVariable("id_cart") String cartID)
      Handler method for DELETE requests to "/cart/{id_cart}". Deletes a cart by ID.
      Parameters:
      cartID - The ID of the cart to delete.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the view name and success message.

    • updateCart

      @PostMapping("/updateCart") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateCart(@RequestParam("id_cart") String cartID, @Valid @ModelAttribute @Valid CartDTO cartDTO, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handler method for POST requests to "/cart/{id_cart}/updateCart". Updates a cart.
      Parameters:
      cartID - The ID of the cart to update.
      cartDTO - The updated CartDTO object.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the view name and updated cart.

    • addToCart

      @PostMapping("/addToCart") public String addToCart(@RequestParam("cartId") String cartId, @RequestParam("productId") String productId)
      Handler method for POST requests to "/cart/addProduct/{id_product}". Adds a product to the cart.
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to add to the cart.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the view name, product details, and success message.

    • removeProductFromCart

      @PostMapping("/removeFromCart") public String removeProductFromCart(@RequestParam("id_product") String id_product, @SessionAttribute("cartId") String cartId)
      Handler method for POST requests to "/cart/shoppingCart/removeProduct/{id_product}". Removes a product from the cart.
      Parameters:
      id_product - The ID of the product to remove from the cart.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView containing the view name and success message.

    • removeAllProductsFromCart

      @PostMapping("/remove/{cartId}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView removeAllProductsFromCart(@RequestParam("cartId") String cartId, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
